channel.title: Keytool on The Dev Haus
channel.description: Recent content in Keytool on The Dev Haus

item.title: How to use Wiremock with HTTPS
item.description: Introduction Wiremock is an awesome HTTP stubbing library which can be used to mock end points. It is super simple and can be used as a standalone server. The beauty is that it can be used to stub SSL endpoints making it very versatile and easier to use. Wiremock although ships with default keystore but it is issues to the creator. If you really want a full fledged SSL then it is a good idea to create the new keystore and use it.
